languages.text: {n}Калькасар умолкает, словно дает понять, что обсуждение данной темы закончено, а затем вкрадчиво, словно невзначай, интересуется:{/n} "Ну а машину-то вы зачем сломали? Столько важных разведданных было утрачено... В донесении господина ван Калокса значится, что он ясно дал вам понять, насколько они ценны, и однозначно потребовал не вмешиваться в расследование".

{n}Calcazar falls silent, giving the impression that the discussion of this topic is concluded, but then in a delicate, almost casual tone, asks,{/n} "And the machine — you destroyed it, why? So much invaluable data — lost... In Master van Calox's dispatch, he reported that he made you well aware of how important that data was, and he clearly requested that you not interfere in the investigation."
languages.original_text: {n}Калькасар умолкает, словно дает понять, что обсуждение данной темы закончено, а затем вкрадчиво, словно невзначай, интересуется:{/n} "Ну а машину-то вы зачем сломали? Столько важных разведданных было утрачено... В донесении господина ван Калокса значится, что он ясно дал вам понять, насколько они ценны, и однозначно потребовал не вмешиваться в расследование".

So much invaluable data — lost... In Master van Calox's dispatch, he reported that he made you well aware of how important that data was, and he clearly requested that you not interfere in the investigation."

So much invaluable data — lost... In Master van Calox's dispatch, he reported that he made you well aware of how important that data was, and he clearly requested that you not interfere in the investigation."

So much invaluable data — lost... In Master van Calox's dispatch, he reported that he made you well aware of how important that data was, and he clearly requested that you not interfere in the investigation."

{n}Calcazar falls silent, giving the impression that the discussion of this topic is concluded, but then in a delicate, almost casual tone, asks,{/n} "And the machine — you destroyed it, why? So much invaluable data — lost... In Master van Calox's dispatch, he reported that he made you well aware of how important that data was, and he clearly requested that you not interfere in the investigation."

languages.text: {n}卡尔卡扎陷入了沉默，让你感觉这个话题的讨论已经结束了。但随后，他以一种微妙的，几乎算得上是随意的语气问道。{/n}“还有那台机器，你把它毁了，这是为什么？那么多无价的数据，全都消失了……根据冯·卡洛克斯大师的报告，他清楚地告诉过你那些数据有多么重要，而且他明确要求你禁止干涉调查。”
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar falls silent, giving the impression that the discussion of this topic is concluded, but then in a delicate, almost casual tone, asks,{/n} "And the machine — you destroyed it, why? So much invaluable data — lost... In Master van Calox's dispatch, he reported that he made you well aware of how important that data was, and he clearly requested that you not interfere in the investigation."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡尔卡扎陷入了沉默，让你感觉这个话题的讨论已经结束了。但随后，他以一种微妙的，几乎算得上是随意的语气问道。{/n}“还有那台机器，你把它毁了，这是为什么？那么多无价的数据，全都消失了……根据冯·卡洛克斯大师的报告，他清楚地告诉过你那些数据有多么重要，而且他明确要求你禁止干涉调查。”

languages.text: {n}Calcazar guarda silencio, dando a entender que el tema queda suficientemente debatido. Pero, acto seguido, en tono delicado y casi informal, pregunta:{/n} «En cuanto a la máquina... la destruyó. ¿Por qué? Tantos datos de valor incalculable, perdidos... En su informe, el maestro van Calox informa de que le indicó claramente la importancia de los datos y que solicitó que no interfiriera con la investigación».
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar falls silent, giving the impression that the discussion of this topic is concluded, but then in a delicate, almost casual tone, asks,{/n} "And the machine — you destroyed it, why? So much invaluable data — lost... In Master van Calox's dispatch, he reported that he made you well aware of how important that data was, and he clearly requested that you not interfere in the investigation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar guarda silencio, dando a entender que el tema queda suficientemente debatido. Pero, acto seguido, en tono delicado y casi informal, pregunta:{/n} «En cuanto a la máquina... la destruyó. ¿Por qué? Tantos datos de valor incalculable, perdidos... En su informe, el maestro van Calox informa de que le indicó claramente la importancia de los datos y que solicitó que no interfiriera con la investigación».

languages.text: {n}カルカサルは黙ったまま、この議題を結論づけようとしていたが、おおむね打ち解けた口調で上品に尋ねかける。{/n}「その機械を…壊したというのか、なぜだ？きわめて貴重なデータが大量にあったというのに。失くしれたのか…マスター・ヴァン・カロックスの報告で、そのデータの重要性をお前は分かっていたと聞いている。調査の邪魔をしないよう要求した、とも」
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar falls silent, giving the impression that the discussion of this topic is concluded, but then in a delicate, almost casual tone, asks,{/n} "And the machine — you destroyed it, why? So much invaluable data — lost... In Master van Calox's dispatch, he reported that he made you well aware of how important that data was, and he clearly requested that you not interfere in the investigation."

traits.locale_text: {n}カルカサルは黙ったまま、この議題を結論づけようとしていたが、おおむね打ち解けた口調で上品に尋ねかける。{/n}「その機械を…壊したというのか、なぜだ？きわめて貴重なデータが大量にあったというのに。失くしれたのか…マスター・ヴァン・カロックスの報告で、そのデータの重要性をお前は分かっていたと聞いている。調査の邪魔をしないよう要求した、とも」

languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar falls silent, giving the impression that the discussion of this topic is concluded, but then in a delicate, almost casual tone, asks,{/n} "And the machine — you destroyed it, why? So much invaluable data — lost... In Master van Calox's dispatch, he reported that he made you well aware of how important that data was, and he clearly requested that you not interfere in the investigation."

languages.text: {n}Calcazar verstummt und vermittelt den Eindruck, das Thema wäre damit abgeschlossen, doch dann fügt er in sanftem, fast gleichgültigen Ton hinzu:{/n} "Und die Maschine ... warum habt Ihr sie zerstört? So viele unbezahlbare Daten – verloren ... Meister van Calox meldete in seinem Bericht, er habe Euch genau informiert, wie wichtig diese Daten waren, und klar gefordert, Ihr solltet Euch nicht in die Untersuchung einmischen."
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar falls silent, giving the impression that the discussion of this topic is concluded, but then in a delicate, almost casual tone, asks,{/n} "And the machine — you destroyed it, why? So much invaluable data — lost... In Master van Calox's dispatch, he reported that he made you well aware of how important that data was, and he clearly requested that you not interfere in the investigation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar verstummt und vermittelt den Eindruck, das Thema wäre damit abgeschlossen, doch dann fügt er in sanftem, fast gleichgültigen Ton hinzu:{/n} "Und die Maschine ... warum habt Ihr sie zerstört? So viele unbezahlbare Daten – verloren ... Meister van Calox meldete in seinem Bericht, er habe Euch genau informiert, wie wichtig diese Daten waren, und klar gefordert, Ihr solltet Euch nicht in die Untersuchung einmischen."

languages.text: {n}Calcazar marque une pause, comme pour signifier la fin de la discussion, avant de poursuivre sur un ton plus doux, presque désinvolte :{/n} « Et puis-je savoir pourquoi vous avez détruit la machine ? Quand je pense à la valeur des données perdues... Dans son rapport, maître van Calox précise vous avoir indiqué à quel point ces données étaient importantes et vous avoir demandé de ne pas intervenir. »
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar falls silent, giving the impression that the discussion of this topic is concluded, but then in a delicate, almost casual tone, asks,{/n} "And the machine — you destroyed it, why? So much invaluable data — lost... In Master van Calox's dispatch, he reported that he made you well aware of how important that data was, and he clearly requested that you not interfere in the investigation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar marque une pause, comme pour signifier la fin de la discussion, avant de poursuivre sur un ton plus doux, presque désinvolte :{/n} « Et puis-je savoir pourquoi vous avez détruit la machine ? Quand je pense à la valeur des données perdues... Dans son rapport, maître van Calox précise vous avoir indiqué à quel point ces données étaient importantes et vous avoir demandé de ne pas intervenir. »

languages.text: {n}Calcazar, sessizliğe gömülerek bu konudaki konuşmanın bitmiş olduğu izlenimi veriyor. Ardındansa nazik, neredeyse arkadaşça bir ses tonuyla soruyor.{/n} "Makineyi yok ettin. Neden? Çok değerli veriler kaybedildi. Üstat van Calox, raporunda o verilerin ne kadar önemli olduğunu ilettiğini ve incelemeye müdahil olmaman gerektiğini açıkça belirttiğini söyledi."
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar falls silent, giving the impression that the discussion of this topic is concluded, but then in a delicate, almost casual tone, asks,{/n} "And the machine — you destroyed it, why? So much invaluable data — lost... In Master van Calox's dispatch, he reported that he made you well aware of how important that data was, and he clearly requested that you not interfere in the investigation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar sessizliğe gömülerek bu konudaki konuşmanın bitmiş olduğu izlenimi veriyor ancak ardından nazik, neredeyse arkadaşça bir ses tonuyla soruyor:{/n} "Makineyi yok ettin. Neden? Çok değerli veriler kaybedildi. Üstat van Calox raporunda o verinin ne kadar önemli olduğu sana net bir şekilde ilettiğini ve incelemeye müdâhil olmaman gerektiğini açıkça belirttiğini söyledi."
